title: Help Identifying font used for the Santa Cruz Music Festival
content:
Hey everyone,

Thanks in advance for the help. Pretty simple: Looking for a font similar or identical to what they used for the "SCMF" portion. I've browsed a number of square fonts but nothing that quite matches the shape and thinness.

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824092125im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1002992_551852768184715_1063285284_n_3683.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1002992\_551852768184715\_1063285284\_n.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824092125/http:/typophile.com/files/1002992_551852768184715_1063285284_n.png) | 434.69 KB |
author: anderjb

comments.content: No match for me either... May be you'll have to consider it as a custom job (not so hard to reproduce actually).
Yeah, I actually did end up doing it custom. I tried to take the easy way out and find a font but realized it'd be quicker just to do it myself. Thanks for the help though.
